entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 30 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023
